wikipedia_page.main: Andy Davis (born 24 October 1975) in the British Virgin Islands is a footballer who plays as a defender and midfielder for British Virgin Islands Championship club Islanders FC and the British Virgin Islands national football team.

response: Andrew or Andy Davis may refer to:
* Andy Davis (American football) (1927–2007), Washington Redskins player
* Andy Davis (Toy Story), fictional character in the film Toy Story
